explains: n. 个性，个人特征；个体，单个实体；个人的嗜好

sentences.en: She expresses her individuality through her clothes.
sentences.cn: 她从穿着上表现出她的个性。

sentences.en: People should be free to express their individuality.
sentences.cn: 人们应该自由表现自己的个性。

sentences.en: Individuality is a valued and inherent part of the British character.
sentences.cn: 个性是英国人重视并固有的特征。
